meanings.definition: Clever or skillful in inventing or devising
meanings.sent1: The enginous inventor created a new type of toy that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her enginous solution to the problem impressed her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The enginous chef decided to make a cake out of vegetables, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His enginous mind worked like a puzzle, always finding new ways to solve problems.
meanings.sent5: The enginous artist painted a masterpiece using only recycled materials.

meanings.sent1: The detective's enginous plan helped solve the mystery quickly.
meanings.sent2: The enginous design of the building made it stand out in the city.
meanings.sent3: The enginous squirrel managed to outsmart the clever fox in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her enginous way of speaking captivated the audience during the speech.
meanings.sent5: The enginous escape artist amazed the crowd with his tricks.

meanings.sent1: The enginous artist used vibrant colors to bring the painting to life.
meanings.sent2: His enginous storytelling kept the children entertained for hours.
meanings.sent3: The enginous musician played a melody that made everyone dance uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her enginous dance moves left the audience in awe at the talent show.
meanings.sent5: The enginous writer crafted a story that transported readers to a magical world.
